forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 59. West wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 77. Northeast wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening deepens over Boston, a tranquil clarity envelops the city. Tonight's forecast hints at a serene existence, with temperatures easing down to a comfortable 59 degrees, caressed by a gentle westward breeze. The city, adorned in the soft glow of urban lights, radiates an inviting calm—an ideal backdrop for a stroll along the Charles or perhaps a late-night visit to a cozy café, where indulging in warm beverages under a starlit sky can be a delightful way to warm the spirit.

Looking toward tomorrow, Boston will awaken to a canvas of mostly sunny skies, promising a high of 77 degrees. The day beckons with a refreshing northeast wind, urging residents and visitors alike to step outdoors. It will be a splendid opportunity to explore the lesser-known paths of the Emerald Necklace, spend an afternoon at a local market, or simply enjoy the artful whispers of the breeze as you find tranquility in one of the city's many parks. A comfortable layer, perhaps a light sweater in anticipation of the cooler evening, will make for the perfect ensemble. Relish this blend of warmth and clarity, for the day invites not just activity, but moments of reflection that enrich the heart of city life.
